--- xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:

> Hydras:
> 
> "Why do you look disapointed Myrmidone?"hissed Hydras

Myrmidon looked over at Hydras, "Disappointed?" Mrmidon shook his head,
"I enjoy the rush of stalking prey, the heat of battle and the thrill
of victory." Myrmidon looked back at Hydras, "I'm not disappointed, I'm
just waiting for the next time we go to the field of battle." He looked
away as he continued following Perceptor.
"Torturing defeated victims is not my element." 

Preston
(Myrmidon)
